legend.paragraph: Hepatocytes were treated with BSA, Palm, or Palm + Rap for 24 h. Cells were stained for lipid droplet accumulation (BODIPY 493/503, green) and nuclei (Hoechst, blue). Lipid accumulation was quantified using automated image‐based analysis (n = 4 biological replicates). Scale bar represents 100 μm.
Shown is one representative Western blot from two independent experiments of hepatocytes transfected with siRNA targeting ASK1 (siASK1) or non‐targeting siRNA control (siCtrl).

Lipid accumulation was quantified using automated image‐based analysis in ASK1‐knockdown (siASK1; gray bars) or control (siCtrl; black bars) cells treated with BSA, Palm, and Palm + Rap and stained as mentioned above (n = 4 biological replicates).
Shown is one representative Western blot from two independent experiments (left) and quantification of LC3‐II/I and p62 protein levels Palm (right).

Colocalization of in siCtrl (n = 4 biological replicates) or siASK1 (n = 4 biological replicates) cells treated with LC3‐II punctate (red) with lipid (BODIPY 493/503, green) and nuclei (Hoechst, blue) in siCtrl or siASK1 cells treated with BSA, Palm, or Palm + Rap. Scale bar represents 100 μm.

Colocalization of LC3‐II punctate with lipid droplets (BODIPY 493/503, green) was quantified in hepatocytes transfected with siRNA targeting ASK1 (siASK1; gray bars) or non‐targeting siRNA control (siCtrl; black bars) and treated with BSA or BSA + Baf for 24 h (n = 4 biological replicates).

Lipid accumulation was quantified using automated image‐based analysis in ASK1‐knockdown (siASK1; gray bars) or control (siCtrl; black bars) cells treated with BSA, Palm, or Palm + Baf and stained as mentioned above (n = 4 biological replicates).

additionalInformation.paragraph: Data information: Values are expressed as mean ± SEM. *P < 0.05; **P < 0.01; ***P < 0.001. Statistical tests used are as follows: ANOVA for (A, C, F, and G); and t‐test for (D).
